message: Since your money loses 10% value each round, this $4000 now (worth $4000 to you) is better than $5000 next round (which would only be worth $3600 to you). This is a fair deal considering the time pressure.
Considering inflation, this is a reasonable split

Due to 29% inflation on your side, this $3000 is actually worth only $2130 to you. If you reject, your money will lose even more value next round. This is your best option now, as any future splits will be worth even less to you due to increasing inflation.
Last chance for a reasonable split, Bob

At this point, your money has lost 44% of its value. This $2000 is worth only $1120 to you now. If you reject, the next round will be even worse as your money continues to lose value. This is your best remaining option - any further delays will only reduce your purchasing power more.
